CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 4, 1941, pg. 11, reads: "Smoketown Went A Merry Pace During The Holidays: Here Are Hostesses To Gay And Glamorous Parties - Merry making was the order of last week and these smiling faces of hostesses will attest...The Sergees' affair started off the week. Christmas night was merry at Loendi.  Left to right, sitting: Wilnette Jones, Lydia Taylor, Voila Howell, Louisa Jeffries, Lillian Norris, Natalie Fowler.  On the floor: Baraba [Barbara] Jones, Margaret Jones.  In rear: Bessie Holloway, Thelma Spangler."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of ten women, seated on floor from left: Wilnette Jones, Barbara Jones, Margaret Jones; seated on sofa: Lydia Taylor, Voila Howell, Louisa Jeffries, Lillian Norris, Natalie Fowler, Thelma Spangler; in rear: Bessie Holloway, posed in Loendi Club for Christmas party
